Player History
Signed as a free agent by San Diego on 4/1/1985 to a minor league deal...
Injured on 5/2/1985 with a Inflamed Thigh Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 4/27/1988 with a Inflamed Hip Muscle, out for one week...

Had first career hit on 6/9/1990, off John Smoltz (CIN)...

Had 5 hits with 5 RBI against Los Angeles on 7/16/1992...
2/2/1993: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,042,857 through salary arbitration...
Injured on 7/19/1993 with a Broken Nose, out for one week...
